name: Sunny Takes Flight
description:
Sunny Takes Flight is a retro-styled top-down shooter where you play as Sunny The Cockatiel. On the day of the Seed Festival, Sunny wakes up to find that the Plovers have blocked up the warp nest, but Sunny finds a hole in her cage and escapes to the outside world!

Currently there is only one level and no saving, as this is a prototype build. Some assets are ported from BIRBOUT!
